sub_title: CEO De Integriteitscoördinator & ECMC (Ethics & Compliance Management & Consulting)| Trainer | Consultant | Interim Ethics & Compliance Officer | External Whistleblowing Reporting Officer
summary:
My goal is to help organizations conduct business in an ethical and compliant way. I am an experienced ethics & compliance professional, with 20 years of compliance experience in various industries. I am experienced in establishing and improving ethics and compliance programs in general and anti-corruption programs and whistleblowing procedures in specific. Other specialties include corporate governance, compliance risk assessments, trade sanctions, (third party) due diligence, modern slavery, ESG and US legislation & prosecution practices. When I was nominated for the National Compliance Award, I was described as "The Compliance Guru".

Recently I founded De Integriteitscoördinator BV. You can appoint us as an external, independent coordinator of your speak-up or whistleblowing procedure. We also provide training on the legislation and the good practices. 

In 2016 I founded ECMC (Ethics & Compliance Management & Consulting). I am available to provide training and advice. I teach at the Netherlands Compliance Institute, SDU Licent, NBA Opleidingen, EIMF in Cyprus, AGRC in London, IMF Academy and the Greek Compliance Officers Association ASCO. Besides that, I am a guest lecturer at various universities. I also provide in-house compliance training; I have provided ethics and compliance training in over 30 countries on virtually all continents. 

I obtained most of my experience in-house. As Global Head of Compliance for Damco, the freight forwarder of the AP Möller-Maersk Group, I was responsible for the compliance activities in 90 countries, focusing mainly on anti-bribery & corruption and trade restrictions. As Chief Compliance Officer Aon EMEA (Europe, Middle East and Africa) I coordinated compliance efforts in some 60 countries, all business units.

Following inquiries from regulators Aon started its anti-corruption program in 2007. I coordinated this program in the EMEA region from the start. According to the US and UK authorities Aon developed a best practice model other firms may wish to adopt. 

I am the former president of the Netherlands Compliance Officers Associaton (VCO) and founded the expert group on Financial Economic Crime (FEC). I am also a member of the expert group on culture & behavior of the association, the expert group on ESG a member of Institute for Financial Crime (IFFC) and a member of the professional advisory committee of the Compliance Minor at The Hague University. In 2020 I was awarded the National Compliance Award and in 2023 I was honored as a top thought leader in trust by Trust Across America/Trust Across The World.

treasury_media.title: Winner of the National Compliance Award 2019
treasury_media.description: The jury voted unanimously to grant the award to Geert Vermeulen because he is a figurehead and role model within the compliance community. The jury labels the breadth of his activities interesting and the way how he participates in the integrity debate as brave....He fulfills an exemplary role in his jobs and in the profession. Besides the fact that he has a clear opinion and high visibility, he is genuinely delivering a positive contribution by teaching/training/improving the profession.

treasury_media.title: Geert Vermeulen on LinkedIn: #ethical #compliant | 129 comments
treasury_media.description: I am extremely honored and proud to have been granted the National Compliance Award today. Wow, absolute highlight in my career; moreover in my life. The... 129 comments on LinkedIn

treasury_media.title: Trust Across America-Trust Around the World Announces 2023 Top Thought Leaders in Trust
treasury_media.description: This year we again recognize those whose professional endeavors include leadership, culture, compliance and ethics, innovation, reputation and risk management, governance, communications, employee engagement, sales and customer service. Our honorees inspire organizations to look more closely at their higher purpose to create greater value for, and trust from all of their stakeholders, and understand trust is a “hard currency” with real returns.

education.field_of_study: Training US export controls (EAR and ITAR)

awards.title: Top Though Leader in Trust
awards.description:
Trust Across America-Trust Around the World (TAA-TAW), global leaders in organizational trust honors its 2023 Top Thought Leaders in Trust. The awards program, now in its 12th year, celebrates professionals who are transforming the way organizations do business.

According to Barbara Kimmel, CEO, ”As in the past, the release of our 2023 honors brings the focus to global champions of trust. This year we again recognize those whose professional endeavors include leadership, culture, compliance and ethics, innovation, reputation and risk management, governance, communications, employee engagement, sales and customer service. Our honorees represent the largest global and functionally diverse group to date.” They inspire organizations to look more closely at their higher purpose…to create greater value for, and trust from all of their stakeholders, and understand trust is a “hard currency” with real returns. See: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/barbarakimmel_trust-across-america-trust-around-the-world-activity-7025786807694848000-hKTA?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop
awards.issuer: Trust Across America / Trust Across The World

awards.title: Winner National Compliance Award 2019
awards.description: The nominator used the following words: "Compliance 'guru' Geert Vermeulen has been a leading and appealing person inside and outside the network of Compliance Officers and Professionals for years. The latter in a literal and figurative sense. He attracts people as a speaker and as a sparring partner (in dialogue). Geert Vermeulen is a keen commentator on the (unfortunately) daily news about financial economic crime (FEC) and compliance and integrity issues - often with texts translated into English and serving a wide audience - and an interesting storyteller with concrete, clearly formulated examples of what he sees happening: close by, but also within Europe, at the World Economic Forum (!), and far beyond. He discuss the behaviour and (public) role of people and organizations and regularly appears in the national and even international press. Not only professional journals, such as the Tijdschrift voor Compliance, but also general media and newspapers, such as Het Financieele Dagblad and recently NRC Handelsblad, know where to find him. Geert Vermeulen has an open personality and always seeks the dialogue, including with himself. He reflects visibly on his own sometimes radical ideas, for example about a public payment network. Within the network of Compliance Officers and Professionals - he seems to be present at all important compliance and risk events - he shares his years of knowledge and experience with enthusiasm, which is also so important for the younger generations (in the necessary dialogue about values and essence/purpose). In all his work you feel, besides his enthusiasm, the sincerity in his goal, the fight against wrongdoing: 'make the world a slightly better place'."

projects.title: Front-Line Anti-Bribery/ECMC Netherlands Roadshow
projects.description: Roadshow with Richard Bistrong, April 4 2017. Richard is a former FCPA violator and FBI cooperator, was convicted to jail in the US and is now one of the Etisphere 100 most influential people in business ethics. We have conducted sessions at a multinational company and at Transparency International Netherlands, talking about how bribery and corruption can be prevented.

authors.headline: CEO De Integriteitscoördinator & ECMC (Ethics & Compliance Management & Consulting)| Trainer | Consultant | Interim Ethics & Compliance Officer | External Whistleblowing Reporting Officer

profile_positions.description:
We are an external, independent coordinator of speak-up or whistleblowing procedures, sometimes called the Whistleblowing Reporting Officer. We offer you the following services: 

- We will handle the communication with the reporter in a confidential way and can also coordinate the investigation for you
- We help you to draft and implement a reporting procedure and investigation protocol. We can also help you communicate this and train your employees.  
- We can prepare the annual or quarterly report on the whistleblowing procedure for you. In The Netherlands it is mandatory to provide an annual report to the Works Council. But it is useful to do this anyway. 

We also offer courses to Integrity Coordinators or Whistleblowing Reporting Officers and help industry associations to communicate the new whistleblowing legislation and good practices to its members.

Shortly all organizations (legal entities) within the EU with 50 employees or more and all organizations that are subject to financial or anti-money laundering/CFT laws have to appoint somebody who is impartial to coordinate their whistleblowing procedure. We have been rolling out and coordinating whistleblowing procedures since 2007 and have handled hundreds of cases, both at multinationals and at small and medium sized enterprises.
profile_positions.title: Founder/CEO  De Integriteitscoördinator B.V. /The Integrity Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Through ECMC I provide the following services:

* Compliance education and training: I provide both institute and in-house training.

* Speaking engagements: I am a regular speaker on ethics and compliance as well as a conference chair.

* Compliance consulting: I help organizations to establish and/or improve their ethics and compliance program in general and their anti-corruption and third party due diligence program in specific. 

* Interim compliance management: I am available to manage compliance projects or fulfill temporary compliance positions. I especially enjoy helping organizations manage a crisis situation. I am also the part-time external ethics & compliance officer of two small organizations.
profile_positions.title: Founder/CEO

profile_positions.description: CrossWind will develop and operate the Hollandse Kust Noord subsidy-free offshore wind project. I am their part-time external ethics & compliance manager
profile_positions.title: External Ethics & Compliance Manager

company.name: KIFFWA - Kenya Innovative Finance Facility for Water

profile_positions.company: KIFFWA - Kenya Innovative Finance Facility for Water
profile_positions.description: I am the part-time external Ethics & Compliance Officer of KIFFWA, where I take care of the due diligence on business partners and the whistleblowing procedure
profile_positions.title: External Ethics & Compliance Officer

profile_positions.description: Senior external Anti-Money Laundering trainer at DFC Academy of ABN AMRO Bank. I am providing adverse media training and identification and verification of clients.  Previously I provided compliance introduction training to new employees, as well as the Duty of Care, Conflicts of Interest and Anti-Bribery and Corruption workshops as an external compliance trainer for the ABN AMRO Compliance Academy.
profile_positions.title: External Compliance Trainer

profile_positions.description: Driessen Assurantiën/Driessen Assuradeuren is a boutique insurance broker and managing general underwriter. I coordinated all compliance matters.
profile_positions.title: Part-time Compliance Manager

profile_positions.description: Vidomes is a social housing corporation based in Delft. I advised Vidomes on all compliance matters on a part-time and interim basis.
profile_positions.title: Interim Compliance Manager

profile_positions.description: IDA Foundation is the world's leading not-for-profit supplier of essential, quality-assured medicines and medical supplies to low- and middle- income countries. IDA Foundation is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands and has offices in India, China, Nigeria, and D.R. Congo. Important business partners include the World Health Organization,  Medicines Sans Frontières, USAID and the Global Fund to Fight Aids, Tuberculosis and Malaria. IDA exports to over 130 countries.
profile_positions.title: Interim Ethics & Compliance Officer

profile_positions.description:
The Netherlands Compliance Institute (NCI) offers compliance education, compliance training and compliance consulting services. NCI also fulfils interim and external compliance officer positions. 

I have managed the consulting services arm of NCI. Apart from that I also contributed to the courses, events and publications of NCI and to the overall management of the company. I have conducted training sessions in respect of compliance in general and anti-corruption and conflicts of interest in specific. I developed an education course for compliance officers who work outside of the financial services industry. I conducted a compliance quick scan at an insurance broker and at a large trading company and provided advice to a major Dutch multinational on how to improve their compliance framework and compliance program, with a focus on their anti-corruption program. I also coordinated a compliance and integrity risk assessment at a semi-public organization.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Damco is the freight forwarding arm of the AP Moller-Maersk Group and has subsidiaries in 90 countries in the world. I was responsible for the design, the implementation and monitoring of the global ethics and compliance program. This entailed:

- Building and leading the compliance network.
- Developing the Damco compliance charter, program, policies, procedures and controls. 
- Conducting compliance risk assessments. 
- Developing and rolling out compliance training and compliance communications. 
- Handling of compliance-related whistleblowing reports and conducting or supervising internal investigations related to compliance. 
- Providing quarterly reports to the Global Leadership Team and guidance and advice to the business management. 
- Supporting the commercial teams with responses to requests for proposals and questions from customers. 
- Representing Damco at the Partnership Against Corruption Initiative (PACI) of the World Economic Forum.

Main focus areas have been anti-corruption, trade restrictions and export controls and competition law.
profile_positions.title: Global Head of Compliance

volunteer_experiences.role: Member Professional Advisory Committee Law Compliance Minor

company.name: The Hague University of Applied Sciences

volunteer_experiences.role: Founder of the Expert Group on Financial Economic Crime (FEC)
volunteer_experiences.description:
The expert group on Financial Economic Crime regularly meets in order to:
- Discuss recent events and share knowledge and experiences
- Identify good practices
- Have a discussion with other stakeholders

We focus on the due diligence of our business partners in respect of various integrity risks, like anti-money laundering, terrorist financing, bribery and corruption, modern slavery/human trafficking, tax risks, etcetera.  The group consists of compliance officers of various (predominantly) financial institutions, like banks, insurance companies, real estate companies, trust/company services providers, money exchange offices, lease companies, etcetera.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of the Expert Group on Culture and Behaviour
volunteer_experiences.description: The expert group on culture and behaviour developed a toolbox, that contains some 40 tools that will enable ethics & compliance officers to influence the company culture and the behaviour of individuals. We won the 2018 Compliance Award for the development of this innovative tool.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of the Expert Group on ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance)

volunteer_experiences.description: I was elected as a member of the co-decision council on behalf of the parents of the students. In the school year 2020/2021 I chaired the meetings.
I chaired the association of compliance professionals in The Netherlands as an extra curricular activity.
This was an extracurricular activity next to my full time job. I was a member of the Board of the association of compliance professionals in The Netherlands.

At VluchtelingenWerk Rijnmond I advised refugee organizations how to set up their organization, how to collect funds and how to organize activities. I have worked with refugees from Africa and the Middle East.
